rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows oriented towards the east for natural light, in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open dining space adjacent to the living room; includes a kitchenette for serving meals.
Modern kitchen with ample counter space, ventilation facing north as per Vastu recommendations.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; window placements ensure privacy and light from the east.
Guest room designed for occasional use, with a simple layout and north facing window.

Dedicated private gym area; includes space for exercise equipment, mirrors, and proper ventilation. Located away from the main living areas to minimize disturbance, with east-facing windows per Vastu guidelines.
General bathroom accessible to guests and family members; includes a water closet area.

openings.description: Main entrance door on the south side, aligning with Vastu principles for a welcoming energy.
Service entrance door located on the north side, ensuring efficient movement and security.
